marklogic.body: Love your recaps, T-Lo, but I disagree about the foreshadowing with Don and Joan. Don's first comment served to heighten the awkwardness of the scene. Joan's mother's comment was just showing her character to be a manipulative nay-sayer . And as for the “I can’t imagine how handsome that man must be when he Blushes” scene, I think that scene was more about Lane. After a day of being brushed Off by Delores and harangued by his wife, here he is consoling a beautiful, buxom woman, and all she can say is how handsome Draper is. Poor sexually frustrated Lane! He's being set up for a fling with the new secretary!
